Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: I'll miss the delicious food at Yangming! Everything is always excellent! Some of our favorite dishes....jumbo lump crabcake, jumbo crab and shrimp fried rice, crabmeat purses and seafood dumplings with the best fortune cookies.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: We come here about once a month, and each time the food is delicious.  Typically we eat at the bar and the service from the bartender is very good.  The wine by the glass selection is pretty good too.  Parking is plentiful.  A great place when you'd rather not cook!

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Had a wonderful dinner experience. The service was wonderful and very attentive. I took my two teenage sons and they also loved it. We ordered the chef surprise dinner and everything was delicious!

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Ideal restaurant banquet hall for birthdays, meetings, weddings and celebrations. Manager Allen was very pleasant to work with. Food tasted authentic if you know how to pick your dishes (skip the general chicken) Parking lot big, plenty for guests.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: My family dined here for the first time in  a couple years. There was no wait, the food was excellent and the waiter was very attentive.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: I know other have left better reviews a good about Yangming. Based on our experience, that is not universal. We arrived for our reservation on time. Menus were  promptly provided. â€¦

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Excellent service and wonderful food.  We had a power outage on Thanksgiving Day and at the last minute had to find somewhere to celebrate the holiday.  The staff accommodated us quickly and we had a wonderful (albeit maybe less â€¦

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: This place is unquestionably one of the best place in the region. Anytime I come there I am absolutely happy. They manage their very high  standard service and the highest level of food  they offer. You will be always satisfied with this restaurant. Very  recommended.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: I sent my friends to this restaurant with my highest recommendations. I  go to this restaurant often. I get very good feedback from my friends. The meals are yummy and the crew is generous and cooperative. always when we go to this place we enjoy a pleasing evening.  I recommend this place with pleasure.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Used to drive past this place coming home from work and thought it might be nice to take my girlfriend. We went and the food was very basic. Wasn't anything really special about the food. Sure there is some dishes that blow you away but â€¦

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Crab meat purses are the best thing ever in the entire world. The staff is nice and the food is immaculate. If you love won ton soup you HAVE to try theirs. Best around I promise you that. Yes it's a little pricey but completely worth it.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Had a great time at a private event. Decent food and drinks. Great party room and dance floor. Decor is nice. My sister recommends coming for regular menu but she says it can be hit or miss.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: This is one of my favorite Chinese restaurants in the area. I've been going for years. In fact, in the last year I think the food has gotten even more delicious; new chef maybe? The wait staff are all friendly and attentive, and the kitchen â€¦

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Found this place while out doing errands. VERY nice! Beautiful set ups, food was quick and delicious. The perfect amount too. Staff was very good, drinks never went empty. 10/10 will go again.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Best catering and dining service ever! We booked Yang Ming for our wedding reception. Not only the food was beautifully presented and extremely delicious, but the manager Allan was super capable and responsible. To make certain the service â€¦

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Yangming was closed for months due to cockroaches and other "pets". The food is not always fresh nor does it usually taste that good. Yangming is a poster child for why you should not believe five star reviews posted online. Do not waste â€¦

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Food was good, portion size was reasonable as was the cost. There were a surprising number of non-Asian dishes on the menu. The decor was still lovely and the service was very good. I will certainly go back.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: My wife and I had takeout from here the other day. The Schezuan style chicken was very nutty, but tasty and full of mushrooms. The four flavor beef was even more delicious. The portions were well sized, but the prices here are a little steep. That said, it's much better than the usual Chinese food.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Very disappointed in my most recent dinner at Yangming. Appetizer of bar-b-que spare ribs consisted of 4 ribs approximately 3.5" long for $10.95. Absolutely absurd! You can get a half rack with a salad and two sides at most restaurants for approximately $15. The entire meal the portions were skimpy and the food was just mediocre.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: We organized a family birthday party for 11 adults, 1 babysitter and 4 grandkids last Saturday night. They gave us a large room on the first floor at the back of the restaurant.  The staff could not have been more helpful and accommodating. â€¦

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: The head chef, Vince, of Yang Ming creates faithful and authentic versions of traditional Chinese fare, such as the steamed pork dumplings, spare ribs, Chinese pizza, and the Sesame chicken- ALL excellent. There are also pleasant surprises â€¦

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Always love Yang Ming! But tonight my companion dropped an envelope containing cash, a large sum of cash. Before we could get into our car and leave the manager chased us down and returned the envelope. Honor is a gift one gives to oneself. Seeing such honor displayed has inspired me. Thank you so much!

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Somehow this is rated as "The Best Chinese Food in the US" - I'm not sure how.  It is good food, but not knock your socks off.  They have a nice dining area and it is suitable for large groups - just make a reservation.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: After re-opening initially  food was delicious but just last week take-out was so awful I threw it out. Won-ton soup was can of beef broth straight from can, strong & salty. The brown gravy with chicken & vegetables tasted rancid.  Will be going elsewhere.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Food was great but service was absolutely amazing.  Could not have had a better experience for dinner.  Highly recommend.  Will be back.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Went here for a birthday. The food was spot on. First time trying duck and it looked as good as it tastes. If you enjoy Carrabba's, Maggianos, or Bertuchis, you'll enjoy this place. Oh, and you never run out of water.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Every item was special with a range of perfectly balanced flavors.  Especially liked the pearl balls (seasonal menu) and golden purse as appetizers, Buddah's delicacy as a vegetarian choice and Mirin chicken as entree.  We went to celebrate several family birthdays and it made an excellent birthday gift to all 5 of us.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: This place is amazing, was here 6 years ago when we lived in the area. And still has the same amazing food and amazing service. I knew we were good to go when we walked through the door to see the same familiar face of the host. The drinks â€¦

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: We've been stuck in Calif. for 20+ years, dreaming of our favorite Peking Duck dish at Yangming... We dined on YM Duck on our 25th Anniversary, this year! It's amazing. We can eat our hearts out for many yrs to come!!ğŸ’•

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Went with a group, and some didn't show. Had a choice of 4 dishes, mostly ok. But when the bill came, we got charged for the people who couldn't make it. Back to Hunan in Ardmore. Better food, more choice. Smaller resturant, but seem like â€¦

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Rumor has it that Yangming will be closing it's doors for good. I will miss it, superb food, at lunch and at dinner, good service and a landmark on Haverford Rd and the Ardmore/Bryn Mawr neighborhoods for many years. Good memories.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: I was served an entree that had a live giant roach moving on top of the food!!! I summoned the waiter & he shrugged his shoulders & told me I would not be charged!!! I asked for the manager, but no one came!! Other diners near my table SAW â€¦

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: The food was delicious as usual.  Their presentation for a birthday/Chinese New year celebration was very nice.  I recommend that restaurant highly.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: â–ˆâ–ˆDANGER!!!!â–ˆâ–ˆ Yangming was closed by the county board of health due to millions of roaches, including cockroaches found in the food, as per Philadelphia Magazine several months ago. For proof, Google their article, "Main Lineâ€™s Yangming â€¦

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: My wife and I love Yangming.  We have been going there since 2005 as her mother used to live in Wayne and then Rosemont.  There is nothing I could/should say negative about the place!  We live in Gettysburg now but when we are in the area we always return to Yangming.  DB/KB

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Refurb looks good. While it is fancier than most Asian food places, the food was good & enjoyable, but not overwhelmingly better. Very nice dining experience.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: This place has the best food. Delicious,  great presentation. Nice atmosphere you will enjoy yourselves.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: We hated this place. The ambience seemed nice at first. But it was a little dark with small spotlights that point to odd places around the table instead of, say, where the menu and food go. Then we noticed the flatware was dirty. The wonton â€¦

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Simple put the food was delicious!! Service was perfect and atmosphere very nice. Worth the visit. Enjoy

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: We got delivery-dumplings, mu shu vegetable, soup.  The crepes were moldy!!! I had already eaten one before I saw the nickel-sized blue-green fuzzy circles. Waiting to see if I get sick. Other than that, bland and old-like the food was â€¦

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: I went with my family so I didnt pay it myself. It's a great Chinese restaurant near Bryn Mawr and It has authentic Chinese food! They have two chiefs, one is for Chinese customers the other is for American customers. You will love it no matter you are Chinese or not Chinese:)

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: I have only tried Yangming's chicken, beef, and seafood dishes. I was not impressed at all, as none of it tasted truly fresh. It had obviously been frozen ages ago and then reheated. Yuck! And cockroaches are hardly Yanming's only problem: â€¦

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: I have to say, this was my family, and I's FAVORITE restaurant! Until, this week, we were informed by the news that this place was infact significantly INFESTED with roaches. A customer claimed to have found roaches in their food. They â€¦

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Food and service were fantastic.   Cannot wait to go back.   A very pleasant experience.   We were a party of 6 and everyone was pleased.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Yangming has been closed by the Board of Health due to their FILTHY conditions, including MILLIONS of cockroaches -- up to two inches long -- being found throughout the restaurant (many were in the FOOD!) I have never liked Yangming's â€¦

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: I enjoyed the Peking duck, dumplings, and spare ribs take out. The order was correct and well packaged. The food was excellent.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Best Chinese food in the area. Great service. Ask for James he's been my guy for years whenever I go!

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Great restaurant for those who want: poor service, rude staff, long waits, and hairs in their cold food. If I could give 0 stars, I would.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: To be honest, I don' t understand why this place is so overrated. Just a plain Chinese restaurant that might mislead you to think you are in a decent one. Parking lot is so inefficiently designed.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Wonderful food - service is impeccable - atmosphere lovely ..a consistently delicious menu with superb service !  Always always a wonderful experience !

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: One of the more popular Chinese restaurants in Bryn Mawr. The food is good quality and better than your standard Chinese restaurant, but the prices are a little high. Good for take out as well.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Forever my favorite. Great food with a kind staff. Love the gunpowder chicken and the chicken lo mein. Will always be back.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Just an average place for Chinese food. Service was good and it's nice on the inside, but food is just average for the price.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Excellent! Alan I have known for 15 years is still the best Manager of any establishment. Alan it is pleasure to eat and see you every time I  visit, thanks .

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: I love the pear salad and duck. Always a good dinner there. Always excellent service. Lovely  atmosphere.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: This spot never fails to deliver. They serve fresh dishes for convenient prices, there is no waiting time even when they are full.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Delicious food, great atmosphere. Hosts are also fantastic. Come here for truly delicious authentic Chinese food!

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: The Kung Pao Chicken is the absolute best I ever had, anywhere.  I wish I could get their receipe.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Best food in the Philadelphia area. The best Asian Chinese Up scale restaurant I have ever had the pleasure of eating.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: The service and the menu are tremendous over the top choices my son throughly enjoyed his birthday pick.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text:
Great appetizers.
Best Peking Duck east of San Francisco.
Friendly wait staff.
Will be back soon.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: This place used to be the go-to. I'm not sure if that's a good thing or not. Last time I went to this establishment, they were "closed for remodeling", and there were rumors of a failed health inspection.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Great food and variety.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Wonderful wonton soup.  One of the  best 	Chinese restaurants in the area.  Cost is for soup, entree, dessert and tip.   Will go back again.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Was there for a private banquet upstairs. Food was great. Drinks at the bar custom to our liking.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Some of the food is precooked which you can taste. You can get the same food from the Chinese store once minute down the road for half the  cost.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Yang Ming has some of the best general tso's. I've been going there for years even after that cockroach scandal. It's pretty good chinese.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: I attended a high school reunion there. They had been closed down for uncleanness a while ago but I thought the food was fine and very tasty.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Excellent food. Rarely crowded these days. Good bar service.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Awesome food, general Tso is the best I have ever had. Awesome serviceğŸ˜

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Beautiful sit down restaurant. Excellent date night place. Wont break the bank, but will impress.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Excellent Food; good people and just an all around friendly atmosphere

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: This is our favorite spot to eat Chinese food.  Awesome food, atmosphere and service.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: One of my favorite places to dine, atmosphere, food and service are superb!

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: This place closed down on Feb 3rd (there were tons of news articles about it), yet  there are generic 5 star reviews of it from 2 weeks ago??? Google needs to fix this.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Great service, food, and the chocolate covered fortune cookies are delicious.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Great atmosphere food is delicious I recommend trying the purses. Awesome

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Good food and great service, i always get lunch at the bar....

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Tri-pepper chicken is a-ok! Pretty interior. Very subdued vibe, like eating in a library.

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: Meals are delicious and service is courteous and fast. One of my favorites

Name: Yangming restaurant
Review Text: My husband and I had a delicious meal! Love this place!

Review Text: I used to love this place but they were cited for roaches. Never will eat here again!

Review Text: Good takeout.  Dining in is risky due to many over-perfumed patrons.

Review Text: Delighted to enjoy good lamb , it is best to experience well made foods in good company

Review Text: Always good Chinese food.  Also a good place for office parties.
